Can the OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER option be set to any value?
No, the OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER option has a specific value, which is 1024. Similarly, the OPTION_NFT_TOKEN option has a specific value, which is 2048.

ill publish prices
OPTION_GATEWAY_NAMECONTROLLER = 1024  // when not set on a gateway, top level ID and currency registration happen on launch chain
OPTION_NFT_TOKEN = 2048        // single satoshi NFT token, tokenizes control over the root ID
```
